dataList.name: The Yellow Harpoon (named by: Ezra)
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Gain [YellowHarpoon] (once per Encounter)

Begins Encounter at 35 SP

Turn End: If the enemy has less than 50% HP, gain [YellowHarpoonSin]
dataList.flavor: "Okay, hear me out. Hear me out, Baby bee! You're good with harpoons, right? You use a super snazzy special harpoon, right? And you're shootin' for the Yellow Color, right? Bam! There ya have it! The Yellow Harpoon!!!"

dataList.name: Gungnir
dataList.desc:
On Clash Win against targets with [BeeSting], trigger [Switch_Vibration] on their [Vibration] into [VibrationBleeding]

On Clash Win against targets with [ArtifactBeeSting], trigger [FusionVibration] on their [Vibration] into [VibrationEcho]

On Hit with the final Coin against targets with both [BeeSting] and [ArtifactBeeSting], trigger [VibrationExplosion]
dataList.flavor:
<color=#fde55d>A precious Relic of the highest rarity, found in the depths of the Ruins.
It was by mere coincidence that the young boy, blood-soaked, came to be in possession of this speartip; coincidentally, he also possessed the aptitude to wield it. 

What is coincidence, indeed?</color>
